testsuite.name: SMB Share Behavior Tests

testcase.name: waitForFileAccessible retries when file appears after delay (simulates SMB latency)
moveFile throws NoSuchFileException when source never becomes accessible
rollbackMove restores original file from temp location
rollbackMove does nothing when temp file doesn't exist
commitMove moves temp file to final destination
waitForFileAccessible returns false when file never appears (simulates SMB file not found)
moveFileWithBackup creates temp file and returns its path
moveFile succeeds when source appears during retry (simulates SMB eventual consistency)
